mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ as userSeq, USER_ID as userId, USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NICKNAME as userNickname, USER_PHONE as userPhone, USER_BOD as userBod, USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as userProfileImageUrl,USER_REGISTER_DATE as userRegisterDate, USER_CLS as userCls FROM USER WHERE USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}

SELECT USER.USER_SEQ as userSeq, USER_ID as userId, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NICKNAME as userNickname, USER_PHONE as userPhone FROM EVENT_MEMBER JOIN USER ON EVENT_MEMBER.USER_SEQ = USER.USER_SEQ WHERE FEED_ID =#{feedId}

SELECT f.FEED_ID, GROUP_ID, FEED_AUTHOR as feed_author_seq ,u.user_name as FEED_AUTHOR, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as authorProfileImageUrl, FEED_TITLE, FEED_CONTENT, FEED_UPLOAD_DATE, FEED_EVENT_DATE, FEED_LOCATION_ID ,fe.good, fe.sad, fe.check, fe.fun, fe.amaze FROM HOME_SNS.FEED f JOIN USER u ON f.feed_author = u.user_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN HOME_SNS.FEED_EMOTION fe ON f.feed_id = fe.feed_id WHERE f.FEED_ID = #{feed_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED ( GROUP_ID , FEED_AUTHOR, FEED_TITLE, FEED_CONTENT, FEED_UPLOAD_DATE, FEED_EVENT_DATE, FEED_LOCATION_ID ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{feedAuthorSeq}, #{feedTitle}, #{feedContent}, now(), #{feedEventDate} , #{feedLocationId} )
INSERT INTO FILE ( FEED_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_URL, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl}, now() )
INSERT INTO HASHTAG ( FEED_ID, HASHTAG_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{hashtagContent})
INSERT INTO EVENT_MEMBER ( FEED_ID , USER_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{userSeq} )
INSERT INTO LOCATION ( GROUP_ID , LOCATION_NAME, LAT, LNG ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{locationName}, #{lat}, #{lng} )
INSERT INTO LOCATION_FAVORITE ( LOCATION_ID , USER_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{locationId}, #{userSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT L.LOCATION_ID, LOCATION_NAME, LAT,LNG, CASE WHEN LF.USER_SEQ IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END as FAVORITE FROM LOCATION L LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM LOCATION_FAVORITE WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}) LF ON L.LOCATION_ID = LF.LOCATION_ID WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId} order by favorite desc;
SELECT user_name, g.user_seq FROM GROUP_MEMBER g JOIN USER u ON g.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE group_id = #{groupId};
mapper.update: UPDATE HOME_SNS.FEED SET FEED_TITLE = #{feedTitle}, FEED_CONTENT = #{feedContent}, FEED_EVENT_DATE = #{feedEventDate}, FEED_LOCATION_ID = #{feedLocationId} WHERE FEED_ID = #{feedId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HOME_SNS.FEED WHERE LOCATION_ID =#{locationId} AND USER_SEQ ={userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED_EMOTION ( FEED_ID, GOOD, SAD, CHECK, FUN, AMAZE ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{good}, #{sad}, #{check}, #{fun}, #{amaze} )
mapper.select: SELECT FEED_ID as feedId, GOOD as good, SAD as sad, CHECK as check, FUN as fun, AMAZE as amaze FROM FEED_EMOTION WHERE FEED_ID = #{feedId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED_EMOTION_USER_USE ( FEED_ID, USER_SEQ, EMOTION_CODE ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{userSeq}, #{code} )
